trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Gatineau
There were no other sightings in Gatineau on or around November 30th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were sitting in our bedroom when my girlfriend saw a blue light shine in the room, the diameter about the size of a bottlecap, we heard noises like a mechanical rumble, it didnt sound distant like a plane or helicopter, her dog was whimpering outside so i went to let her in, when i came back i heard banging and shuffling outside her basement window, my girlfriend and i looked outside assuming it was some animal, then she saw something strange in the sky, it looked like a star was changing colors, then it started to move and it seemed to turn around, then we saw it was like a short blimp shape, with what seemed to be a narrow blue light emmiting from a flexable almost elephant trunk looking hose,we were freaked out when we saw this because we saw the same light shine through our window,we then saw narrow beams of blue light shooting upwards towards the sky from this object and narrow beams of green and red flashed downwards from it, it was doing this for about 15 minutes and it was moving very quickly in circles, after that it vanished completely then reapearred as if further away several seconds later, it was not emitting any rays of light this time it stayed a solid red and white color, it stayed reapeared for only a moment, about 15 seconds before it vanished for a second time, after this we heard and saw nothing for the rest of the night, we were freaked out because i was wondering what the noises were outside her basement window, there was no way that was a sattlelite because we saw the outline and it was no more then about a football field away, it made no noise other then the mechanical rumble which lasted only a few seconds,and if it was military related, why would they send "lasers" upwards? and downwards? satelite signals are not visible, - Johnny Veary & Vanessa Brazeau
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
